vanaspati.definition: Any refined edible vegetable oil or oils, subjected to a process of hydrogenation.

special_provisions.sal_seed_fat_limit: Not more than 10% of the total oil mix.
special_provisions.imported_palm_oil_provision: Imported crude palm oil and its fractions must be used for vanaspati/hydrogenated oil production only by manufacturers with on-site hydrogen generation and hydrogenation facilities.

general_requirements.harmful_substances: Shall not contain any harmful colouring, flavouring or matter deleterious to health.
general_requirements.color: No color resembling ghee shall be added.
general_requirements.flavor: If flavor is used, it must be distinct from ghee, from a list of permissible flavors.
general_requirements.diacetyl_for_armed_forces: Diacetyl (max 4.0 ppm) may be added to vanaspati for the Armed Forces.
general_requirements.appearance_and_taste: On melting, shall be clear, free from staleness or rancidity, with pleasant taste and smell.
general_requirements.sesame_oil_test: Shall contain sufficient raw or refined sesame (til) oil so that when mixed with refined groundnut oil (20:80), the Baudouin test is not lighter than 2.0 red units.
general_requirements.additives: No anti-oxidant, synergist, emulsifier, or other such substance shall be added without prior sanction of the Authority.

bakery_shortening.definition: Vanaspati used as a shortening or leavening agent for bakery products.
bakery_shortening.general_requirements: Conforms to Vanaspati standards, with exceptions.

exceptions.aeration: Only nitrogen, air, or inert gas may be used. Quantity shall not exceed 12% by volume.
exceptions.emulsifiers: May contain added mono-glycerides and diglycerides.

container_filling_standards.description: For all rigid containers, the product shall occupy not less than 90.0% of the water capacity of the container. Water capacity is the volume of distilled water at 20Â°C that a sealed container can hold.
container_filling_standards.note: This is a recurring standard for many products.

thermally_processed_fruits.definition: Products obtained from sound, matured, fresh, dehydrated or frozen fruits, processed by heat to prevent spoilage.

thermally_processed_fruit_cocktail.definition: Product from a mixture of fresh, frozen, dehydrated or processed fruits, processed by heat to prevent spoilage.

thermally_processed_vegetables.definition: Product from fresh, dehydrated or frozen vegetables, processed by heat to prevent spoilage.

thermally_processed_curried_vegetables_r.definition: Product prepared from various vegetables, legumes, cereals or pulses, processed by heat to prevent spoilage.
thermally_processed_curried_vegetables_r.composition: May contain salt, sweeteners, spices, edible vegetable oils, milk fat, etc.

thermally_processed_vegetable_soups.definition: Unfermented product from juice/pulp/puree of vegetables, cooked and heat processed to prevent spoilage.

thermally_processed_fruit_juices.definition: Unfermented, pulpy, turbid or clear juice from ripe fruit, processed by heat. May be reconstituted from concentrate.
thermally_processed_fruit_juices.sweeteners: May contain nutritive sweeteners (up to 50 g/kg, or 200 g/kg in very acidic fruits). Not called 'sweetened' if added sweeteners do not exceed 15 g/kg.

requirements_table.product: Mango, Guava or any other pulp fruit
Other fruit juices of single species - not very acidic
Other fruit juices of single species - very acidic
Other fruit juices of single species or combination thereof - not very acidic
Other fruit juices of single species or combination thereof - very acidic

thermally_processed_vegetable_juices.definition: Unfermented or lactic acid fermented product from edible parts of vegetables, processed by heat.

thermally_processed_tomato_juice.definition: Unfermented juice from ripe tomatoes, processed by heat. Free from skin, seeds, and coarse parts.

thermally_processed_fruit_nectars.definition: Unfermented, pulpy or non-pulpy product from fruit juice/pulp, blended with water and sweeteners and processed by heat.

requirements_table.product: Other Fruit Nectars of High Acidity/Pulpy / Strong flavour

thermally_processed_fruit_beverages_frui.definition: Unfermented product from fruit juice/pulp/puree with water and other ingredients, heat processed.

thermally_processed_mango_pulp_puree.definition: Unfermented product from ripe mangoes, heat processed.

thermally_processed_fruit_pulp_puree_oth.definition: Unfermented product from ripe fruit, heat processed.
thermally_processed_fruit_pulp_puree_oth.sweeteners: May be described as sweetened if nutritive sweeteners exceed 15g/kg.

thermally_processed_concentrated_fruit_v.definition: Unfermented, fermentable product from fruit/vegetable juice, pulp, or puree, from which water has been removed to at least double the original soluble content.

thermally_processed_tomato_puree_and_pas.definition: Unfermented product obtained by concentrating tomato juice.

soup_powders.definition: Product obtained by mechanical dehydration of fruit/vegetable juice, pulp, or puree.

fruit_vegetable_juice_pulp_puree_with_pr.definition: Unfermented, fermentable product from fruit/vegetable juice, pulp, or puree, preserved for industrial use.

concentrated_fruit_vegetable_juice_pulp_.definition: Unfermented, fermentable product from fruit/vegetable juice, pulp, or puree with water removed to at least double the original soluble content.

tamarind_pulp_puree_and_concentrate.definition: Unfermented, fermentable product from tamarind, preserved by thermal processing or preservatives.

fruit_bar_toffee.definition: Product from fruit pulp/puree blended with sweeteners and fats, dehydrated into a sheet.

fruit_vegetable_cereal_flakes.definition: Product from fruit/vegetable pulp/puree blended with starch, cereals, and sweeteners, dehydrated into flakes.

squashes_crushes_fruit_syrups_fruit_shar.definition: Products from unfermented fruit juice/puree blended with sweeteners, water, and other ingredients.
squashes_crushes_fruit_syrups_fruit_shar.notes: Syrups/sharbats with a minimum of 10% dry fruits can be called fruit syrups.

ginger_cocktail.definition: Product from ginger juice, oleoresin, or essence with water and sweeteners.

synthetic_syrup_for_use_in_dispensers_fo.definition: Syrup for carbonated water, blending sweeteners with water and other ingredients.

synthetic_syrup_or_sharbat.definition: Syrup from sugar, dextrose, or liquid glucose. May contain fruit juice.

murabba.definition: Product prepared from fruits, rhizomes, or vegetables by impregnating with sweeteners to preserve.

definitions.candied: Product from fruits/vegetables impregnated with sweeteners.
definitions.crystallised: Candied product coated with crystallized sugar.
definitions.glazed: Candied product coated with a thin layer of heavy syrup.

tomato_ketchup_and_tomato_sauce.definition: Product from tomato juice/puree/paste blended with sweeteners, salt, vinegar, spices, and condiments.

culinary_pastes_fruits_and_vegetable_sau.definition: Culinary preparation from edible fruits/vegetables, cooked with sweeteners, salt, spices, etc.

soyabean_sauce.definition: Product from fermented soyabean paste blended with salt and sweeteners.

carbonated_fruit_beverages_or_fruit_drin.definition: Beverage from fruit juice and carbonated water with sugar and other ingredients.

jam.definition: Product from fruit pieces or pulp/puree boiled with sweeteners to a suitable consistency.

fruit_jelly.definition: Product from fruit juice boiled with sweeteners and concentrated to gelatinize on cooling.

fruit_cheese.definition: Product from fruit pulp/puree cooked with salt and sweeteners to a thick consistency that sets on cooling.

marmalades.definition: Product from fruit, peel, pulp, and juice boiled with sweeteners to gelatinize on cooling.

dehydrated_fruits.definition: Product from edible parts of fruits with moisture removed to preserve it.

dehydrated_vegetables.definition: Product from edible portions of vegetables with moisture removed to preserve it.

requirements_table.name: Tubers (Arvi, Lotus Root Tapioca, Yam, Carrot, Potato)
Powders of other vegetables including tomatoes

frozen_fruits_fruit_products.definition: Product from fresh, sound fruits, quick frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

frozen_vegetables.definition: Product from sound, clean vegetables, quick frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

frozen_curried_vegetables_ready_to_eat_v.definition: Product from vegetables, legumes, cereals or pulses, frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

fruit_based_beverage_mix_powdered_fruit_.definition: Powdered product for dilution, from fruit solids with sweeteners and other ingredients.

fruits_and_vegetable_chutney.definition: Product from cooked fruits and/or vegetables with sweeteners, preserved by thermal processing or other means.

mango_chutney.definition: Product from cooked mangoes with sweeteners, preserved by thermal processing or other means.

pickles.definition: Preparation from fruits or vegetables preserved in salt, acid, sugar, or a combination.

table_olives.definition: Product from sound, clean olive fruits, processed and preserved.

requirements_table.product: Green olives with natural lactic fermentation

grated_desiccated_coconut.definition: Product from peeled, milled, and dried coconut kernel.

brewed_vinegar.definition: Product from alcoholic and acetic acid fermentation of suitable mediums. Not fortified with acetic acid.

requirements.prohibited_substances: Sulphuric acid, other mineral acids, foreign substances, colouring matter except caramel.

synthetic_vinegar.definition: Product from acetic acid with or without caramel and spices.

requirements.prohibited_substances: Sulphuric acid, other mineral acids, foreign substances, colouring matter except caramel.

synthetic_vinegar.labeling: Must be distinctly labeled as 'SYNTHETIC - PREPARED FROM ACETIC ACID'.

groundnut_kernel_deshelled.definition: Kernels from the plant arachis hypogols, for direct human consumption.
groundnut_kernel_deshelled.prohibited_substances: Non-edible seeds like mahua, caster, neem or argemone, coloring matter, and preservatives.

raisins.definition: Dried sound, clean grapes of proper maturity. May be with or without seeds and stems, and bleached with Sulphur Dioxide.

pistachio_nuts.definition: Mature seeds of Pistacia vera L with naturally or mechanically opened shells. May be raw, roasted, or salted.

dates.definition: Dried sound, clean fruits of proper maturity from Phoenix dactylifera. May be treated with sugar, glucose syrup, flour, and vegetable oil.

dry_fruits_and_nuts.definition: Products from dried sound, clean fruits and nuts of proper maturity.

bean.definition: Dry kidney shaped or flattened seeds of leguminous varieties.

atta.definition: Coarse product from milling or grinding clean wheat.

fortified_atta.definition: Atta with added calcium carbonate, iron, thiamine, riboflavin, and niacin.

protein_rich_paushtik_atta.definition: Wheat atta mixed with up to 10% groundnut or soya flour or a combination.

maida.definition: Fine product from milling and bolting clean wheat.

fortified_maida.definition: Maida with added calcium carbonate, iron, thiamine, riboflavin, and niacin.

protein_rich_paushtik_maida.definition: Maida mixed with up to 10% groundnut or soya flour or a combination.

semolina_suji_or_rawa.definition: Product from grinding and bolting clean wheat.

besan.definition: Product from grinding dehusked Bengal gram.

pearl_barley_jau.definition: Product from sound and clean barley. Free from fermented, musty taste/odour, adulterants, insect/fungus infestation, and rodent contamination.

barley_powder.definition: Product from grinding clean and sound dehusked barley grains.

wholemeal_barley_powder_or_barley_flour_.definition: Product from grinding clean and sound dehusked barley grains.

food_grains_general_standards.definition: Whole or broken kernels of cereals, millets and pulses.
food_grains_general_standards.prohibited_substances: Argemone, Maxicana and Kesari in any form, added colouring matter, insecticide residues beyond specified limits.

food_grains_specific_standards.grain: Any other foodgrains not specified above

cornflour_maize_starch.definition: Starch obtained from maize (zea mays L.).

corn_flakes.definition: Product from dehulled, degermed and cooked corn by flaking and toasting.

custard_powder.definition: Product from maize or sago/topioca with other starches and ingredients.

macaroni_products.definition: Products like macaroni, spaghetti, vermicelli from suji or maida with other ingredients.

malted_milk_food.definition: Product from mixing milk or milk powder with wort from malted cereals and wheat flour, prepared in a powder or granule form.
malted_milk_food.microbiological_requirements: Yeast and mould, Salmonella and Shigella, E.Coli, Vibrio cholera and V.Paraheamolyticus, Faecal streptococci and Staphylococcus aureas are all to be absent in specified quantities.

malt_based_foods_malt_food.definition: Product from mixing malt with other cereal and legume flour, with or without milk or other ingredients.

rolled_oats.definition: Product from sound hulled oats, in the form of crisp flakes.

solvent_extract_soya_flour.definition: Product from clean soyabeans, cracked, dehulled, solvent extracted with food grade hexane and ground.

solvent_extracted_groundnut_flour.definition: Product from fresh, clean, degermed groundnut kernels, extracted with food grade hexane.

solvent_extracted_sesame_flour.definition: Product from pressed, clean sesame seeds, solvent extracted with food grade hexane.

solvent_extracted_coconut_flour.definition: Product from fresh coconut kernels or dried copra, extracted with food grade hexane.

solvent_extracted_cotton_seed_flour.definition: Product from solvent extraction of oil from oil cake from cotton seed.

starchy_foods.arrowroot: Separated and purified starch from the rhizomes of Maranta arundinacea or Curcuma augustifolia.

sago.definition: Small hard globules or pearls from the starch of the sago palm or tapioca tubers.

biscuits_including_wafer_biscuits.definition: Made from maida, vanaspati or other fats/oils, with various ingredients.

bread.definition: Product from a mixture of wheat atta, maida, water, salt, yeast, and other ingredients.

definitions.animal: Ovines, Caprines, Suillines, Bovines, poultry, and fish.
definitions.carcass: Dead body or any part of an animal slaughtered for human consumption.
definitions.meat: Flesh and other edible parts of a carcass.
definitions.meat_food_products: Articles of food from meat, prepared by drying, curing, smoking, cooking, etc., with specific exclusions.
definitions.slaughter_house: Licensed building for the slaughter of animals for human consumption.

canned_corned_beef.definition: Product from boneless meat of bovine animals, uniformly cured and heat treated.
canned_corned_beef.ingredients: Edible common salt, sodium/potassium nitrite. May contain ascorbic acid/isoascorbate acid and their sodium salts (max 500 mg/kg), nutritive sweeteners.

canned_luncheon_meat.definition: Product from edible meat of mammalian animals or poultry, uniformly cured and heat treated.
canned_luncheon_meat.ingredients: Edible common salt, sodium/potassium nitrite. May be with or without binders, spices, seasonings, flavor enhancers, ascorbic acid/isoascorbic acid (max 500 mg/kg), and sodium/potassium mono-di-polyphosphates (max 3000 mg/kg).

canned_cooked_ham.definition: Product from meat of pigs, free from bones, cartilage, tendons, and ligaments. Uniformly cured and heat treated.
canned_cooked_ham.ingredients: Edible common salt, sodium/potassium nitrite. May contain sweeteners, spices, gelatin, flavor enhancers, ascorbic acid/isoascorbic acid (max 500 mg/kg), sodium/potassium mono-di-polyphosphates (max 3000 mg/kg), and other emulsifying/stabilizing agents.

canned_chopped_meat.definition: Product from edible meat of mammalian animals or poultry, uniformly cured and heat treated.
canned_chopped_meat.ingredients: Edible common salt, sodium/potassium nitrite. May be with or without binders, spices, seasonings, flavor enhancers, ascorbic acid/isoascorbic acid (max 500 mg/kg), and sodium/potassium mono-di-polyphosphates (max 3000 mg/kg).

canned_chicken.definition: Product from edible meat of poultry, free from bones, blood clots, skin, etc. Cured with salt and sodium nitrite.
canned_chicken.requirements: Free from added color, flavor, and meat tenderizer. Heat treated to be shelf stable.

canned_mutton_and_goat_meat.definition: Product from edible meat of sheep and goat, free from bones, blood clots, skin, etc. Cured with salt and sodium nitrate/nitrite.
canned_mutton_and_goat_meat.requirements: Free from added color, flavor, and meat tenderizer. Heat treated to be shelf stable.

frozen_mutton_chicken_goat_and_buffalo_m.definition: Product from edible meat of specified animals, quickly frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

frozen_shrimps_or_prawns.definition: Product from fresh shrimps of sound quality, frozen to -18Â°C or colder. May be peeled, unpeeled, raw or cooked.

frozen_lobsters.definition: Product from fresh lobsters of sound quality, frozen to -18Â°C or colder. May be raw or cooked.

frozen_squid_and_parts_of_squid.definition: Product from fresh squid of sound quality, frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

frozen_finfish.definition: Product from fresh fish of good quality, frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

frozen_fish_fillets_or_minced_fish_flesh.definition: Products from fresh wholesome fish, frozen to -18Â°C or colder.

dried_shark_fins.definition: Product from fins of fresh shark, dried.

salted_fish_dried_salted_fish.definition: Product from fresh wholesome fish, saturated with salt and dried.

canned_finfish.definition: Product from flesh of fresh finfish, packed and heat treated for commercial sterility.

canned_shrimp.definition: Product from fresh shrimp with head, shell, and antenna removed, packed and heat treated.

canned_sardines_or_sardine_type_products.definition: Product from fresh or frozen fish of specific species, packed and heat treated.

canned_salmon.definition: Product from fresh fish of specific species, packed and heat treated.

canned_crab_meat.definition: Product from live crabs, packed and heat treated.

canned_tuna_and_bonito.definition: Product from fresh fish of specific species, packed and heat treated.

sugar_boiled_confectionery.definition: Processed food from boiled sugar with or without doctoring agents. May have center filling or coating.
sugar_boiled_confectionery.ingredients: Sugar, invert sugar, jaggery, milk, edible molasses, starches, fats, nuts, cocoa, vitamins, etc.

lozenges.definition: Confections from pulverized sugar with binding materials, made by cold mixing.

chewing_gum_and_bubble_gum.definition: Prepared from gum base, sugar, and liquid glucose.

chocolate.definition: Homogeneous product from cocoa beans, cocoa nib, etc., with or without sugar, milk solids, and cocoa butter. No vegetable fat other than cocoa butter.

requirements_table.unit: per cent by weight, Not less than
per cent by weight, Not less than
(on Moisture-free and fat free basis) percent by weight Not less than
(on Moisture-free and fat-free basis) percent by weight. Not less than
(on moisture fat and sugar free basis) percent by weight. Not more than

ice_lollies_or_edible_ices.definition: Frozen ice product containing sugar, syrup, fruit, etc. No artificial sweetener.

ice_candy.definition: Product from freezing a pasteurized mix of water, sweeteners, fruits, and other ingredients.

plantation_white_sugar.definition: Crystallised product from sugarcane or sugar beet.

refined_sugar.definition: White crystallised sugar from refining plantation white sugar.

khandsari_sugar.definition: Obtained from sugarcane juice by open pan process. Two varieties: Desi and Sulphur Sugar.

bura_sugar.definition: Fine grain size product from any kind of sugar.

cube_sugar.definition: Sugar in the form of cubes from refined crystallised sugar.

icing_sugar.definition: Sugar manufactured by pulverizing refined sugar or vacuum pan sugar with or without edible starch.

misri.definition: Product in candy form from sugar or palmyrah juice.

honey.definition: Natural sweet substance produced by honey bees from nectar or plant secretions.

gur_or_jaggery.definition: Product from boiling or processing sugarcane or palm juice.

dextrose.definition: White or light cream granular powder.

requirements.acidity: Not more than 0.20 ml of N/10 sodium hydroxide to neutralize 0.5 gm.

dried_glucose_syrup.definition: White to creamish white powder, sweet to taste.

saccharin_sodium.definition: Commonly known as soluble Saccharin, with empirical formula C7 H4 NNaO3S.2H2O.

aspartyl_phenylalanine_methyl_ester_aspe.definition: Commonly known as Aspertame, with empirical formula C14 H18 N2 O5.
